div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 15px; margin-left: 182px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(209, 231, 255), rgb(24, 43, 63)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(66, 133, 244), rgb(76, 133, 229));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(200, 230, 201), rgb(28, 54, 29)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 249, 196), rgb(33, 28, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(251, 188, 5), rgb(129, 75, 0));

fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 143px; margin-left: 536px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(251, 188, 5), rgb(129, 75, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(251, 188, 5), rgb(129, 75, 0));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
